alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Nye County Deserts, CNC Dispatch (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 16 at 3:08AM PDT until June 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM PDT TODAY AND FRIDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 460... * AFFECTED AREA...In Nevada...Fire weather zone 460. * TIMING...11 am to 11 pm Thursday and Friday. * WIND...20 to 25 mph sustained winds gusting to 40 mph Thursday. Stronger winds on Friday with sustained winds of 30 to 35 mph gusting to 55 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity of 5 to 10 percent. * IMPACTS...A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not recommended. Heed all fire restrictions.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Nye County Deserts, CNC Dispatch
